AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mine Beardling
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] younger years, aiding the miners in any way [PAWN_pronoun] could. [PAWN_pronoun] used [PAWN_possessive] relatively smaller body to wiggle into spaces the adults couldn't, helping to located new veins of precious ore.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Royal Guard's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Growing up with a father responsible for protection of a Dwarf lord gave [PAWN_nameDef] exposure to military training early. Normal studies were less important, but the arts of war were always a priority.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hammerer's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Growing up with a father responsible for protection of a Dwarf lord gave [PAWN_nameDef] exposure to both royalty and military training early. Normal studies were less important, but the arts of war and properly carrying oneself were always a priority.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Having had [PAWN_possessive] home overrun by greenskins at an early age, [PAWN_nameDef] had to grow up quickly. Survival on the road was harsh, and shame was constant whenever other dawi were encountered.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ranger's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a ranger. Ranger skills as well as general distrust from other dawi were passed on to [PAWN_objective] from a young age.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Thane's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a thane. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught many skills in youth that would lead to an increased leadership ability, as well as being a solid dwarf.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Engineer's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was an engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] was always around the height of dwarfen technology, and taught the basics early on.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cook's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was from a family of renowned chefs. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in the kitchen while [PAWN_possessive] mother and father prepared meals fit for a lord on a daily basis.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Abductee child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was abducted by humans when [PAWN_pronoun] was a baby. They had planned on leveraging the skills which the dwarfs are renowned for when [PAWN_pronoun] grew up. [PAWN_nameDef] grew too smart and strong for [PAWN_possessive] captors, and eventually escaped.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Brewmaster's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only child of a brewmaster. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up around the brewery while [PAWN_possessive] father meticulously worked on the ale. [PAWN_pronoun] was convinced that [PAWN_possessive] father loved [PAWN_possessive] recipes and ale far more than [PAWN_possessive] only child.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Trader's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a trader and learned how to haggle and bargain; [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days on the road traveling and [PAWN_possessive] nights exploring the local area while playing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Studious beardling
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] pursued education extensively as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] spent all of [PAWN_possessive] free time learning, reading, experimenting, and the like.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a blacksmith and his father was a blacksmith. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up playing around the forge, and began learning the dawi's most valued trade at an early age.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Farm child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were farmers for their clan and grew all manner of crops whether it be for food or export; these skills were passed on to [PAWN_objective] from a young age.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Troubadour child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were entertainers. The family orchestrated elaborate plays, practiced makeup, sang songs, and more.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Blessed child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born under a divine sign. [PAWN_pronoun] was held in high regard from an early age, and was taught many things related to the dwarfen gods.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Thief's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the child of thieves. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up around the scoundrels of the dwarf populace, knowing that exile would await should one of [PAWN_possessive] parents be caught in the act.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child prodigy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was obviously intellectually gifted from a very young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned delicate skills faster than other dwarf children, and really took an interest in intellectual pursuits.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling spy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained to spy by [PAWN_possessive] guildmaster and father. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to sneak around, and gather information to take back to [PAWN_possessive] father, so that perhaps their guild would get a leg up on the other clan guilds.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling grunt
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Growing up in [PAWN_possessive] fathers lab, [PAWN_nameDef] was given the life of a societal elite. [PAWN_pronoun] obtained everything [PAWN_pronoun] desired, and price was never an issue. However [PAWN_possessive] did not partake in the luxury given to [PAWN_possessive]. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] pursued more psychical, and in [PAWN_possessive] fathers eyes, lower class jobs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Herder child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on the mountain sides, under the tutalege of [PAWN_objective] father, and worked every day on the farm tending to the livestock. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time alone.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dishonored thane's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a thane fallen to shame when [PAWN_possessive] hold was overrun. [PAWN_pronoun] was wrought with shame, as was the rest of [PAWN_objective] family at their failure.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling dreamer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an expressive child. [PAWN_pronoun] sang often, and made friends quite easily, whether they were young or old, male or female. [PAWN_pronoun] hated fighting, but when made angry, [PAWN_pronoun] could be dangerous. [PAWN_objective] temper was quick.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Feral child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was accidentally separated and lost at a very young age from [PAWN_objective] family. [PAWN_pronoun] was lost in the wilderness, and forced to survive on [PAWN_objective] own.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling firekeeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for keeping the fire in [PAWN_objective] uncle's forge going all day and night. [PAWN_pronoun] took this duty very seriously, and was successful at it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: History student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] spent learned many artistic forms including music and writing. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew older, [PAWN_pronoun] began to study legends of the kings of old as well as the legends of the victories and grudges of ages past.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling of the peaks
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: growing up on the frozen wastes of the mountain peaks, [PAWN_nameDef] only had a scarce number of animals and a few hard-bitten relatives as companions. The lack of social interaction resulted in the development of an interest in engineering but [PAWN_pronoun] never developed any great fondness for others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling nurse
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born during a long and catastrophic war between clans. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up helping [PAWN_possessive] parents in an infirmary, treating the cascade of horrific wounds from the battlefield. Although scarred, [PAWN_pronoun] was left with a lifelong fear of battle, and strong medicinal skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a family of dwarfen doctors, and chose to maintain the tradition. [PAWN_pronoun] had few friends, but got along with [PAWN_possessive] siblings very well.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling mercenary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the child of mercenaries. [PAWN_pronoun] traveled with them, and learned skills and techniques for fighting as well as how to craft simple but useful gadgets.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling loner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always a loner. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to pursue [PAWN_possessive] passions in solitude, whether it be tinkering with [PAWN_possessive] tools, or lining up [PAWN_possessive] figurines and shooting them down with [PAWN_possessive] crossbow.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with a passion for art. From a very young age [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to draw, paint, and carve wood or stone into something prettier.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mute beardling
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was greatly affected by a traumatic event early in [PAWN_possessive] life. For many years [PAWN_pronoun] refused to speak to people, preferring instead to play with [PAWN_possessive] clan's numerous animals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pampered beardling
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born to a wealthy merchant's family, [PAWN_nameDef] was raised to be the best, and given every expensive extravagance. This pampered lifestyle which caused [PAWN_objective] to miss many basic lessons others take for granted.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pyromaniac beardling
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: From an early age, [PAWN_nameDef] had an unhealthy fascination with fire and the Irondrakes. [PAWN_pronoun] would set refuse heaps ablaze and become entranced by the flames, [PAWN_pronoun] would absent-mindedly burn [PAWN_objective]self. One day while playing with a clan drakegun, [PAWN_pronoun] carelessly set flame to all the furniture in [PAWN_possessive] home.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Reclusive beardling
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] didn't learn to speak until [PAWN_pronoun] much later than other dwarf children and even then [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to keep to [PAWN_objective]self. When [PAWN_pronoun] was in [PAWN_possessive] early dwarf teens, [PAWN_pronoun] made a habit of wandering off from the hold to live in the wilderness for weeks at a time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling scavenger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up the child of a family that was tasked with searching abandoned and destroyed holds. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to survive on the road, and to always be wary of danger. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to fend off attackers many times, as frequently an abandoned hold acquired new inhabitants quickly.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sentimental beardling
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a kind child. When anybody had a problem, [PAWN_pronoun] tried to fix it. Being a child, [PAWN_pronoun] did not always succeed and this hurt [PAWN_possessive] sensitive soul. [PAWN_pronoun] dreamed of being a warrior who fights greenskin and skaven raiders.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sickly beardling
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] suffered from a rare disease. Quarantined from family and clan, [PAWN_pronoun] had minimal social contact, and got little physical exercise. In the sterile hospital environment, however [PAWN_pronoun] became very familiar with science and medicine.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hunter's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In the mountains of the olde world, [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by [PAWN_possessive] mother. She taught [PAWN_objective] survival skills; trapping, tracking, shooting and more. [PAWN_possessive] father had left behind an old dwarfen rifle, and [PAWN_nameDef] practiced with it every chance [PAWN_pronoun] got.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling writer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] was addicted to reading. [PAWN_pronoun] would spend all day hidden away with [PAWN_possessive] nose in a tome. [PAWN_nameDef] was distraught at how rare good tomes were, and [PAWN_pronoun] decided to fill that gap by writing [PAWN_possessive] own stories instead.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] studied engineering and botany for entertainment. [PAWN_pronoun] was proficient at convincing [PAWN_possessive] peers to do [PAWN_possessive] chores, and made it a goal in life to avoid physical labor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beardling gadgeteer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always enthralled by all of the new gadgets and machines produced by the engineering guild. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time taking intricate gadgets apart and rebuilding them while learning how they worked. [PAWN_pronoun] always felt awkward around others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Far north child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the far north, in the peaks of the chaos wastes. Despite a dwarf's natural resilience to the corruption of chaos, others always thought that something was a bit off with [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Traumatized child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] family was attacked by greenskins when [PAWN_pronoun] was very young. [PAWN_pronoun] barely survived and no one else lived to tell the tale. [PAWN_nameDef] became a loner before finding dwarfen civilization again, and still bears many a grudge to this day. [PAWN_pronoun] finds it hard to focus on things for too long, and is one of the few dwarfs that loves fresh outside air.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Delinquent Beardling
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only child of slothful parents. [PAWN_possessive] parents were rarely interested in [PAWN_objective], and [PAWN_pronoun] therefore found more troublesome ways to get attention.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Thane
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Thane. [PAWN_pronoun] oversees his hold in every way, [PAWN_possessive] leadership goes unquestioned and is unfailing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a ranger, [PAWN_nameDef] traveled outside the safety of the dwarfen holds. Duties included surveying the Dwarfen lands, scavenging, hunting and more. Being self sufficient was necessary for survival.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a miner. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days under the mountain, expanding the livable space or seeking and mining rare ore. This included building the necessary supports, blasting out huge rocks, and everything else involved in a mining operation.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Brewer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Dwarfs obtain nutrients and enjoyment from ale. [PAWN_nameDef] is responsible for the ale's creation. All brewers strive to become as renowned as the great Bugman; testing recipes and variations, all while hoping to give rise to an amazing brew.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] provides the clan with food. [PAWN_possessive] skill at cooking and agricultural knowledge is vastly superior to most.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Trader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is responsible for negotiating trade with foreigners as well as selling Dwarfen wares. This requires travelling the world, and much bargaining.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the hold's engineer. [PAWN_possessive] skill at building structures, gadgets, machines and weapons is nothing but awe inspiring.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Laborer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was never good at much. [PAWN_possessive] only useful skill was aquired while training the rats that live in the kitchens and hidden areas of the hold.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Warrior
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a warrior of the hold. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to use the axe and hammer with much skill, which assisted in [PAWN_objective] building a life defending the hold from threats; from above as well as below.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ironbreaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a prestigious warrior of the hold. [PAWN_possessive] lifetime with an axe and hammer has honed [PAWN_possessive] melee skill, and [PAWN_pronoun]'s much lauded through the clans.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hammerer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a prestigious warrior of the hold, chosen for [PAWN_possessive] honor and fighting prowess to protect a Dwarf Lord. [PAWN_pronoun]'s much lauded through the clans for [PAWN_possessive] fighting skills, and unbreakable sense of honor and dwarfen pride.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Thunderer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Having been in the thunderer's guild for a large part of [PAWN_possessive] life, [PAWN_nameDef] has become an expert at shooting and maintaining [PAWN_possessive] own weaponry.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Crafter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master craftsman. [PAWN_pronoun] is responsible for creating anything that the clan needs; including clothing, furniture, ale barrels, and even armor and weapons.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Adventurer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was never one to sit still. [PAWN_pronoun] has travelled much outside the hold, working as little as possible along the way.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ascetic runepriest
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After taking a vow of silence, [PAWN_nameDef] disappeared into the runepriest's guild to pursue the knowledge of the gods. [PAWN_pronoun] found much joy in growing herbs and other plants, in addition to making foods for the runepriests to enjoy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tavern keep
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] owned and operated a tavern. [PAWN_pronoun] grew adept at serving ales, diplomacy, and head-bashing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beast hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled the mountainsides and undermountain hunting violent beasts of all types. [PAWN_pronoun] slew many foul greenskin and skaven beasts, as well as their masters. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed the thrill of the hunt, and the meat from the kill but preferred to work alone.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has been a blacksmith [PAWN_possessive] whole life. [PAWN_pronoun] has gained reknown for his skills at making weapons and armor both in times of peace as well as war. [PAWN_possessive] skill at using the weapons [PAWN_pronoun] creates is also notable.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Castaway
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was on a ship that sank, further solidifying the dwarfen belief that dwarfs have no business on the ocean. [PAWN_pronoun] was abandoned and forced to live on [PAWN_possessive] own while struggling on the journey back to civilization. [PAWN_possessive] survival skills became well honed, but spending so much time alone caused for a lack of social ettiquette.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Grudge settler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has spent [PAWN_possessive] life helping others settle their grudges; for gold of course. [PAWN_pronoun] generally assists those that are in no shape to help themselves, and trains to keep [PAWN_possessive] skills up, in order to best handle any situation that may arise.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hold tender
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] survived a debilitating injury when young. As an adult, when others go off to war, [PAWN_nameDef] spends [PAWN_possessive] time tending to all manner of tasks that have to be taken care of to keep the hold running.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Settler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has been present at the founding of a new hold. Such an endeavour requires a solid general grasp on all manner of tasks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Construction engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a construction worker, and frequently assists in the planning process. From roof supports to bridges to homes, [PAWN_pronoun] does it all. Because [PAWN_pronoun] has always been around the work crews, [PAWN_pronoun]'s never had to cook a meal in his life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Deep miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] did the sweaty, grimy work of getting metal out of the ground deep under the hold. [PAWN_pronoun] used [PAWN_possessive] hands-on skills daily - and wasn't bad in a bar fight either.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Drifter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] could never commit to a proper dwarfen line of life. [PAWN_pronoun] travelled outside the hold often, taking up casual work when it presented itself and was required. [PAWN_pronoun] liked to whittle and sculpt, although never showed any aptitude for it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Escaped convict
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] denies involvement in crimes that brought about [PAWN_possessive] incarceration. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped by tunneling out of a mountain cell using modified cutlery and sneaking past the guards while they were drunk on ale.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gyrocoptor pilot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is adept at piloting a gyrocoptor. [PAWN_possessive] favorite thing in the world is soaring above the mountains and seeing the vastness of the world and [PAWN_pronoun] much prefers it to the company of others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Grunt worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] did menial, unskilled work around the hold. [PAWN_possessive] job also included caring for the mules and goats which were used for the transport of goods.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fervent researcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a young adult, [PAWN_nameDef] was sure that [PAWN_possessive] hold and its people were nearing a time of glory. A firm belief that [PAWN_possessive] research would develop a new level of dwarfen technology that would be the catalyst for a new age for [PAWN_possessive] clan.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gatherer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master gatherer. [PAWN_pronoun] can find food in the most barren of places using [PAWN_possessive] expansive knowledge of plants, fungi, roots, and berries. Whether on the mountainsides, or under the mountain, [PAWN_pronoun] excels at finding the best edible morsels.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gardener
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always kept a very impressive garden. Using techniques [PAWN_pronoun] developed, [PAWN_pronoun] gets the best results anyone could hope for.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chirurgeon
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a chirurgeon in the holds and on the battlefield. [PAWN_possessive] duties including patching up warriors after a battle or raid, requiring quick judgement and nimble fingers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Herbalist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived near the entrance to the hold, and frequented the mountainside forests. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the lore of wild herbs and fungi; figuring out how to treat minor ailments and infections, as well as ease aches and pains, and treat certain male specific issues. Many in the hold have sought [PAWN_objective] out for his skills, which would always be provided, for a price.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: House servant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Being from a poor family, [PAWN_nameDef] became a house servant for a wealthy dawi family early in adulthood. [PAWN_pronoun] got to know the entirety of [PAWN_possessive] master's mansion well, but never did any work outside of the home.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to track and trap any animal through the most dangerous of places, above ground or below, and had extensive knowledge of many ingenious methods of taking down specific large animals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tinkerer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spends most of [PAWN_possessive] time locked in [PAWN_possessive] makeshift workshop trying to invent something useful. Having been refused entry to the engineering guild, [PAWN_pronoun] has made it [PAWN_possessive] life's goal to develop something that will blow the minds of everyone that has ever doubted [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Loner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] never cared much for the clan leaders and their decisions. [PAWN_pronoun] prefers independence both physically and mentally, and spends most of [PAWN_possessive] time alone, occasionally visiting with family and [PAWN_possessive] very few friends, but never for long.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Luddite
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] doesn't care for all this newfangled technology that the engineering guild is constantly coming up with. Give [PAWN_possessive] a good steel axe or a simple crossbow, and [PAWN_pronoun]'s happy. Keep the new stuff away from [PAWN_possessive].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Collector
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is obsessed with trinkets, artifacts, old weapons, shiny stones, and much more. [PAWN_pronoun] hoards the stuff in [PAWN_possessive] home, obtaining them anywhere he can. [PAWN_pronoun] has a bad habit of talking about the collection long after most poeple have stopped listening.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Guild master
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] leads a dwarfen guild, making decisions on production, apprentice assignments, general budgeting, and much more. This position of power gives [PAWN_objective] influence over the lives of many, and makes many fear and resent [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Master chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has been a chef for a dwarfen lord since becoming an adult and apprenticing under the previous chef. [PAWN_pronoun] can cook anything exquisitely, and believes presentation to be equally as important to taste when it comes to food.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Farm oaf
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Tilling, hoeing, guiding ox carts, pushing wheelbarrows, digging ditches, planting seeds and predicting the harvest. Farm oafs aren't educated in the usual sense, but they know more than most about growing plants. That said, such a life leaves one essentially incapable of participating in intellectual activities.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary leader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] led what started off as small band of mercenaries that sold their axes to the highest bidder for gold. Eventually the company grew, as did their notoriety; reaching a point where [PAWN_nameDef] claimed they were known throughout the Olde World over.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Message carrier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is responsible for carrying messages from hold to hold. Be it by gyrocoptor, beast, afoot, or on water, [PAWN_pronoun] gets the messages there despite all obstacles.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pugilist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a fighter, and prefers to do so for money. [PAWN_pronoun] has squared off against many challengers, and has won more than lost.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sailor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] traversed the oceans on journeys of exploration, seeking out plant and animal specimens from exotic places, and occasionally fending off pirates on a dwarfen steam ship. [PAWN_pronoun] is a rare dwarf that loved the sea so much [PAWN_pronoun] refused to do all but the barest minimum of work on land, except to sell the treasures [PAWN_pronoun] collected.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Scout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is frequently sent from the hold to scout the mountain roads and passes; thus the clans ensure that no greenskin or other horde is making way for them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lawman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enforces law in the hold. [PAWN_pronoun] tracks and catches wrong-doers, be they thieves or oath breakers. [PAWN_objective] has gained reknown for being honest, and helping many people find justice against those that have wronged them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Smuggler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a knack for stealing goods, and trafficking contraband without getting caught. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually saved up enough to buy a ship, and used it to travel around the Olde World dealing [PAWN_possessive] goods in person.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Piracy appears everywhere that leadership is weak and where society is spread thin. [PAWN_nameDef] was part of this age-old part of existence, extorting and plundering peaceful trade ships for profit. [PAWN_pronoun] hoped to one day win the level of the infamy of the much lauded Long Drong's Slayer Pirates, though as of yet [PAWN_pronoun] hasn't approached that level of fame.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Janitor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a janitor in a huge guild hall. [PAWN_possessive] duties include a multitude of cleaning and maintenance items; from sweeping the floors to oiling the door hinges.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Taster
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was brought on as the taster for a thane after his lordship suffered a vicious case of food poisoning. Any dish served at the royal table had to be sampled first by [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] lived a decadent lifestyle at court, getting fat and doing very little work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Minor blacksmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a minor blacksmith living in a surface village. [PAWN_pronoun] stuck to basic useful items such as horse shoes, hinges, nails, and so on. [PAWN_pronoun] never aspired to be a master weaponsmith or armorer. After [PAWN_possessive] village was overrun by greenskins, he spent some time living with a human tribe, crafting fine knives and work hammers, traveling, and selling [PAWN_possessive] wares between settlements.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Torturer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was frequently used to get information out of captive grobi, raki, and more; to determine why they were caught in dwarfen lands and whether more were on the way. [PAWN_possessive] skill at drawing out answers was notable, and had no issue dispatching his interviewees once he'd received the information he sought.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Treasure hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] explored the width and breadth of the Olde Worlde in search of treasure, with little success. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually struck out for the jungles of the new world, where [PAWN_pronoun] hit it big by finding a large golden statue of some bizarre lizard creature. [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] lads made it back to civilization, and made a fortune selling the statue off to a rich Imperial citizen; they've been planning a return trip ever since, but are happily living on their wealth at the moment.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tunnel illuminator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was gifted with night vision far superb to that even of other dwarfs. [PAWN_pronoun] has used that trait to much success, traveling the mining tunnels under the hold, marking spots to dig with bioluminescent fungus, and warning others of impending danger.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mathematician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] works for a branch of the vast engineering guild, doing mathematical research. [PAWN_pronoun] spends much of [PAWN_possessive] spare time immersed in arc of fire algorithms for grudge throwers and even cannons, hoping to develop a more accurate method of aiming the warmachines. That's a bit of an irony as [PAWN_possessive] own aim with a crossbow was never what any one would have called accurate.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Taxonomist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] travelled all around the Olde World, studying and classifying the plant and animal life [PAWN_pronoun] found in the hopes of creating a complete catalogue.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Geologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked with miners and cave-diggers, identifying rock types and natural formations; although all dwarfs are well-versed in such matters, [PAWN_nameDef] is an absolute expert. During [PAWN_possessive] years in the mines [PAWN_pronoun] also gained experience repairing experimental dwarfen drilling machines, and other equipment.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Assassin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional assassin. [PAWN_pronoun] was cold, calculating, and made a good profit. In this business an utter lack of empathy was an asset. Whether hired to off an upcoming orc lord, an uncouth human leader, or perhaps even a dwarf, efficiency was [PAWN_possessive] business.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Actor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has travelled the Olde World with a company of actors, playing in packed theatres filled with loving audiences everywhere. [PAWN_pronoun] was a perfectionist, and made [PAWN_possessive] own props and costumes rather than use the ones [PAWN_pronoun] was given.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Battlefield tactician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was found to have a sharp mind for battle planning when still a young soldier. [PAWN_pronoun] worked [PAWN_possessive] way up the ladder, eventually earning much reknown as a skilled tactician. [PAWN_pronoun] can read a battlefield like few others, knowing immediately the best places to build defenses, stage quarrellers and warmachines, line up the troops, and more.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Veteranarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] treated sick and injured animals for a living. Seeing their suffering affected [PAWN_possessive] stance on the practice of eating meat, and for many years [PAWN_pronoun] lived as a vegetarian, rejecting the meat-loving culinary tradition of most dwarfs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Blasting expert
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an explosives engineer employed in the mines. [PAWN_pronoun] took [PAWN_possessive] job very seriously, and was well-versed in the technicalities - so much so that [PAWN_pronoun] refused to demean [PAWN_objective]self by helping with the clean-up once [PAWN_possessive] carefully-calculated explosion was complete.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Calculator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] turned out to have an excellent memory, and a gift for performing complex calculations in [PAWN_possessive] head. [PAWN_pronoun] was frequently employed by the engineer's guild to track trajectories for war machines, the miner's guild to calculate the proper amount of blasting powder to safely blow up stubborn mine shafts, and many others. [PAWN_nameDef] has a very scientific brain.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Architect
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] designed and constructed buildings. In [PAWN_possessive] home hold under the mountain, most of the technical aspects of architecture were handled by the engineering guild. This enabled [PAWN_possessive] to push the artistic limits of the craft, but also meant [PAWN_pronoun] never had to get [PAWN_possessive] hands dirty at building sites.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sculptor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] started off sculpting small desk top-sized chunks of stone, but [PAWN_pronoun] soon began to think bigger. [PAWN_pronoun] made bigger and bigger sculptures until he was ready to begin [PAWN_possessive] life's work: carving the face of the goddess Valaya on a massive scale into the mountain side of the hold. Sadly, the hold was attacked by a greenskin horde before [PAWN_pronoun] could begin in earnest, and [PAWN_possessive]'s yet to return to continue to work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Healer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After [PAWN_possessive] hold's elder healer was slain during a skaven raid, [PAWN_nameDef] took up the mantle. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days scrounging up herbs and mineral compounds from the nearby area to use in surprisingly effective remedies.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lore keeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of a long line of lore keepers in [PAWN_possessive] clan. Every night around the fire, [PAWN_pronoun] would pass on ancient knowledge and helpful wisdom through stories. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled at teaching the histories of the clans and the dwarfs as a race, while making the stories enjoyable for all ages of audience.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Grudge keeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s job is to keep the book of grudges. [PAWN_pronoun] makes sure that all grudges are properly recorded, and crossed out should they ever be settled. Many visit [PAWN_possessive] to share their grievances for proper recording.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Con artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] never created anything in [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] did, however, prove to be a natural at getting others to give [PAWN_possessive] what they had created. [PAWN_pronoun] prefers to use these skills on non-dwarfs, but has occasionally taken advantage of [PAWN_possessive] own kind; although only under dire personal circumstances, of course.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hermit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Most dwarfs are considered hermits by human standards, but [PAWN_nameDef] really has exemplified the term. Worn out by the pressures of social interaction, [PAWN_nameDef] left [PAWN_possessive] crowded underground hold to live a simple life in the wilderness. There, [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days alone, tending [PAWN_possessive] garden and crafting the simple tools [PAWN_pronoun] needed to survive.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Minstrel
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a traveling entertainer. [PAWN_pronoun] could be found telling stories or singing songs, and is capable of protecting [PAWN_objective]self from the dangers of the road. However, [PAWN_pronoun] was always conspicuously absent whenever there was hard labour to be done.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Teacher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] educated beardlings in the basics; history, metals, the gods, and so on. [PAWN_pronoun] was very knowledgeable, and well-liked by [PAWN_possessive] students.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Master Jeweler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] makes some of the most beautiful, and well-made jewelry that gold can buy. [PAWN_possessive] pieces were once sought far and wide, and [PAWN_possessive] craft once made [PAWN_objective] exceptionally wealthy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Combat engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] became a notable combat engineer and [PAWN_pronoun] would travel with the dwarfen armies when in the field, repairing warmachines, armor, thunderer guns, and more; when [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't in the heat of the battle cracking heads that is.
